algorithm_technique: Apply leap year rules and standard month lengths to determine the number of days.
problem_summary_simple: Return the number of days in a given month and year.
problem_summary_technical: Calculates days based on month, applying leap year logic for February.
key_insights: The primary complexity lies in correctly implementing the leap year rules: divisible by 4, but not by 100 unless also divisible by 400.
February is the only month whose length depends on the year.
A concise way to handle month lengths is using modulo arithmetic on the month index.
